dist

Class DiscreteDistributionTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.AbstractDistribution
      • dist.AbstractConditionalDistribution
        • dist.DiscreteDistributionTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionalDistribution, Distribution, java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleStateDistributionTable

    public class DiscreteDistributionTable
extends AbstractConditionalDistribution
implements Copyable
    A class implementing a look up table for conditional probability, that is representing P(O = o | I = i) for some single discrete random variables O the output and I the input
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
